name: paint-io-server
description: Server package for the websockets workshop

scripts.release: mkdir -p ./build/lib/commonjs/$npm_package_name/ && cp -r src ./build/lib/commonjs/$npm_package_name/ && cp package.json ./build/lib/commonjs/$npm_package_name/package.json && cp server.js ./build/lib/commonjs/$npm_package_name/server.js

author: Will Farley <wfarley@amazon.com>
